column3: Latest;Siem Reap: Police in Siem Reap Province arrested a foreigner with no visa and clear signs of mental instability at 11:00 am on July 12
column8: the authorities have sent the foreigner to Siem Reap eviction preparation office to begin proceedings. ------MCPN------*He first entered the news radar on Friday in a serious of FB posts from Siem Reap.
